themeDescription: How 2026-era biofeedback and physical AI close the loop between body signals and conscious self-regulation, enabling precise personal growth through lived data.

newNodes.label: Somatic Signal Awareness
newNodes.description: Foundation of embodied intelligence: noticing heart rate, breath, tension, and posture as live signals. Personal growth begins when the body becomes readable rather than ignored.

newNodes.label: Biofeedback Mirroring
newNodes.description: Wearables and ambient systems externalize inner states as sound, light, or motion. Consciousness grows by seeing the self from outside, collapsing blind spots.

newNodes.label: Adaptive Self-Regulation
newNodes.description: Through repeated loops, the nervous system learns to steer itself in real time. Growth becomes skillful modulation rather than forceful control.

newNodes.label: Somatic Habit Encoding
newNodes.description: Regulated states crystallize into habits stored in muscle memory and posture. Identity shifts as the body quietly enforces new defaults.

newNodes.label: Whole-System Coherence
newNodes.description: At depth, body, environment, and intention synchronize as one adaptive system. Consciousness experiences regulation as effortless alignment rather than effort.

progressionNote: Suggested entry at layer 3 via somatic awareness; max depth 8–9 when loops extend to collective and environmental biofeedback systems.
